name: Accessibility Phase - Profile, MyHistory, Email Verify
description:
ritical Ballpark App flows and relevant test cases for ADA audit.

Initial flows:
*Branch Deeplink
*Verification Email
*Profile
*My History
*Team Tab (nice to have)


The test cases are written with End to End customer flows in mind. 
Below are a list of particular pages in the flows, for each platform. 
The pages are included within each test case as the transitions occur. 
Included intentionally to be part of the audit, Error handling steps and validation on the pages within the onboarding/login flows.


|||:ANDROID|:iOS|:PageName
|| ANDROID PAGE 1 | IOS PAGE 1 | Welcome to Ballpark - Get Started 
|| ANDROID PAGE 2 |  | Sign UP
